players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out to keep our town safe."

Diana: "Charlie, I understand your concern, but rushing to vote out Bob without clear evidence might backfire. Let's observe a bit more and see if anyone else acts suspiciously before deciding."
